game.name: Nonsense Defense
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roguelite tower defense with moveable chaos. Build towers and troops, drag them mid battle, dash through danger, and defend your crystal solo or with up to three friends in online co op.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roguelite tower defense with moveable chaos. Build towers and troops, drag them mid battle, dash through danger, and defend your crystal solo or with up to three friends in online co op.
